Koalog Util API documentation

UTIL is a set of common classes for all KOALOG projects.

See:

Packages

com.koalog.util.list This package contains classes useful for lists manipulation.
com.koalog.util.matrix This package contains classes useful for manipulating matrices.
com.koalog.util.swing Provide a set of classes that let define an application from a XML file.
com.koalog.util.swing.action This package contains a set of useful actions.
